jobs.title: Strategic Partnerships Lead (United States & Canada)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Overview

CoinTracker makes cryptocurrency portfolio tracking and tax compliance simple. CoinTracker enables consumers and businesses to seamlessly track their cryptocurrency portfolio, investment performance, taxes, and more. We are a globally distributed team on a mission to enable everyone in the world to use crypto with peace of mind. Learn more about our mission, culture, and hiring process.


Some things we’re proud of

  • 🛠️ Building foundational tools in the cryptocurrency space

  • 📄 Over 1M tax forms generated

  • 💲 $250B+ in cryptocurrency is tracked on CoinTracker (~over 5% of the entire crypto market)

  • 🤝 Partnered with Coinbase, H&R Block, Intuit TurboTax, MetaMask, OpenSea, Phantom, Solana, and Uniswap

  • 🗺️ Founders: Jon previously built TextNow (200M downloads), Chandan was previously a product manager at Google & Google[x]

  • 💼 $100M+ venture capital raised from Accel, General Catalyst, Y Combinator, Initialized Capital, Coinbase Ventures, Kraken Ventures, Intuit Ventures, 776 Ventures, Balaji Srinivasan, Claire Hughes Johnson, Gokul Rajaram, Serena Williams, Zach Perret

  • 🌴 Awesome benefits

Your mission

In this role, you will drive distribution partnerships with crypto companies. CoinTracker is the leading crypto tax and accounting product in the US, with over 50% market share and tracking over $50 billion of crypto assets. We are the official partner of Coinbase, Intuit, H&R Block. This is a senior role at CoinTracker, responsible for the strategy and ownership of relationships across the crypto industry. You will be working with the world’s most advanced crypto companies. You will make an impact by growing CoinTracker’s business and shaping the future of how people use cryptocurrency.

Your one year outcomes

  • Lead CoinTracker’s partnerships with top crypto companies

  • In combination with product and engineering, develop solutions that lead to successful partnerships with exchanges and DeFi partners

  • Develop quality, authentic, deep relationships with all the partners covered

  • Distribute CoinTracker’s offering to premium customers (e.g., “whale accounts”) through strategic partnerships

  • Identify new revenue opportunities through partnerships

What you will do

  • Own, cultivate, and grow CoinTracker's relationships with external parties

  • Develop the business strategy that drives CoinTracker’s growth through partnerships

  • Negotiate and sign deals with the world’s premier crypto companies

  • Own end-to-end partnership deals, including partner outreach, pitching, deal structure, negotiation, launch, and growth

  • Influence our product and direction by using the voice of partners in our product-development process

  • Work cross-functionally internally to align the partnership strategy with the overall business

What we look for

Role-agnostic

  • Impact: Demonstrated ability to drive business impact

  • Mission alignment: Hungry and motivated about making progress towards our mission of Enabling everyone in the world to use crypto with peace of mind.

  • Trust: Say what you believe. Do what you say.

  • Communication: Able to clearly talk about the details and also zoom out to the bigger picture

Role-specific

  • Strong experience working with crypto teams at partner companies

  • 8+ years of experience in partnerships or related functions (e.g., corporate development, business development)

  • Proven track record of closing high-impact deals with partners. Led long-term deals with large companies

  • Experience driving partnerships at a start-up/growth company in the past

  • Proven to work cross-functionally with Finance, Legal, Product, Engineering, and more

  • Have developed strong executive relationships

The starting salary for this position is between $185,000 - $275,000. The actual compensation offered will be based on a variety of job-related factors including relevant skills, education, and experience. This position also includes equity in CoinTracker and benefits like medical, dental, vision, 401(k), life insurance, and PTO.

jobs.title: Growth Marketing Lead (United States & Canada)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Overview

CoinTracker makes cryptocurrency portfolio tracking and tax compliance simple. CoinTracker enables consumers and businesses to seamlessly track their cryptocurrency portfolio, investment performance, taxes, and more. We are a globally distributed team on a mission to enable everyone in the world to use crypto with peace of mind. Learn more about our mission, culture, and hiring process.


Some things we’re proud of

  • 🛠️ Building foundational tools in the cryptocurrency space

  • 📄 Over 1M tax forms generated

  • 💲 $250B+ in cryptocurrency is tracked on CoinTracker (~over 5% of the entire crypto market)

  • 🤝 Partnered with Coinbase, H&R Block, Intuit TurboTax, MetaMask, OpenSea, Phantom, Solana, and Uniswap

  • 🗺️ Founders: Jon previously built TextNow (200M downloads), Chandan was previously a product manager at Google & Google[x]

  • 💼 $100M+ venture capital raised from Accel, General Catalyst, Y Combinator, Initialized Capital, Coinbase Ventures, Kraken Ventures, Intuit Ventures, 776 Ventures, Balaji Srinivasan, Claire Hughes Johnson, Gokul Rajaram, Serena Williams, Zach Perret

  • 🌴 Awesome benefits

Your opportunity

Join CoinTracker as our first Growth Marketing Lead, owning the channels, analytics, and experimentation that fuel our next stage of growth. You’ll build and optimize a high-velocity growth engine across paid media, affiliates, SEO, and lifecycle — driving measurable acquisition, retention, and revenue impact.

This is a high-autonomy, high-impact role at the intersection of product, marketing, and data. You’ll partner with design, product, vendors, and leadership to bring discipline and velocity to growth marketing — perfect for someone who thrives in ambiguity, enjoys testing and learning, and wants to scale a consumer + enterprise crypto business.

1-year outcomes

  • Scalable, efficient performance marketing program delivering net-new users and enterprise leads at or below target CAC.

  • Affiliate program structured with tracking, incentives, and partner content reuse, driving meaningful incremental customers.

  • SEO and organic experiments measurably increase traffic to priority surfaces.

  • Attribution framework (via Roadway, Segment, Metabase, etc.) implemented and trusted by stakeholders.

  • Growth experimentation roadmap validated with at least one new high-ROI channel (e.g., referral, co-marketing, gamification).

  • Clear reporting and dashboards (Looker, Notion, Slack updates) enabling ROI visibility and resourcing decisions.

You will

  • Own paid acquisition campaigns (Meta, Google, TikTok, Reddit, LinkedIn) — from strategy to creative testing and optimization.

  • Manage and scale CoinTracker’s affiliate program, with structured tracking, incentives, and ROI analysis.

  • Partner on SEO improvements and lightweight content/organic experiments.

  • Implement and maintain attribution frameworks (pixels, CAPI, Roadway, Segment, SDKs) to measure impact with confidence.

  • Build a campaign and experimentation calendar — ensuring high test velocity and tight learning loops.

  • Collaborate cross-functionally with design, product, social, finance, and vendors to execute campaigns on time and with impact.

  • Provide clear reporting on channel performance, ROI, and recommendations for budget allocation.

  • Explore referral, gamification, and viral growth loops to unlock new sources of acquisition and engagement.

Some of the skills that we are excited about

  • 8+ years of experience in growth or performance marketing, ideally in B2C fintech, SaaS, or marketplaces (crypto a plus).

  • Proven ability to run and optimize multi-channel paid campaigns with measurable ROI.

  • Hands-on experience with tracking/attribution tools (pixels, SDKs, CAPI, Segment, Roadway, Looker).

  • Affiliate program management and channel optimization experience.

  • Familiarity with SEO and lifecycle marketing best practices.

  • Strong analytical and testing mindset; comfortable building dashboards and frameworks.

  • Ability to thrive in ambiguity — strategic thinker and scrappy executor.

  • Curiosity about crypto and fintech trends, with the ability to translate insights into growth strategies.

The starting salary for this position is between $160,000 - $185,000 USD. Candidate's location does not impact the posted salary range. The actual compensation offered will be based on a variety of job-related factors including relevant skills, education, and experience. This position also includes equity in CoinTracker and benefits like medical, dental, vision, 401(k), life insurance, and PTO.

jobs.title: Technical Support Contractor
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Overview

CoinTracker makes cryptocurrency portfolio tracking and tax compliance simple. CoinTracker enables consumers and businesses to seamlessly track their cryptocurrency portfolio, investment performance, taxes, and more. We are a globally distributed team on a mission to enable everyone in the world to use crypto with peace of mind. Learn more about our mission, culture, and hiring process.


Some things we’re proud of

  • 🛠️ Building foundational tools in the cryptocurrency space

  • 📄 Over 1M tax forms generated

  • 💲 $250B+ in cryptocurrency is tracked on CoinTracker (~over 5% of the entire crypto market)

  • 🤝 Partnered with Coinbase, H&R Block, Intuit TurboTax, MetaMask, OpenSea, Phantom, Solana, and Uniswap

  • 🗺️ Founders: Jon previously built TextNow (200M downloads), Chandan was previously a product manager at Google & Google[x]

  • 💼 $100M+ venture capital raised from Accel, General Catalyst, Y Combinator, Initialized Capital, Coinbase Ventures, Kraken Ventures, Intuit Ventures, 776 Ventures, Balaji Srinivasan, Claire Hughes Johnson, Gokul Rajaram, Serena Williams, Zach Perret

Your mission

Provide extraordinary support to customers during tax season ensuring peace of mind for all crypto users.

Your tax season outcomes

  • Work directly with users, and customer support team members, to execute the team's goal.

  • Maintain a customer satisfaction (CSAT) score of at least 85%.

  • Debug, serve as an escalation point and trend product feedback and/or issues based on interactions.

What you will do

  • Work directly with customers, customer support and client managers to troubleshoot complex technical issues.

  • Work directly with the engineering team to provide feedback on trending issues, inform product development and roadmap planning.

What we look for

  • Role-agnostic

    • Impact: Demonstrated ability to drive business impact

    • Mission alignment: Hungry and motivated about making progress towards our mission of Enabling everyone in the world to use crypto with peace of mind.

    • Trust: Say what you believe. Do what you say.

    • Communication: Able to clearly talk about the details and also zoom out to the bigger picture

  • Role-specific

    • Problem Solving

      • Seeks solutions for complex crypto problems, will not rest until there is a clear outcome.

      • Enjoys a hard problem, looks at unraveling a puzzle as an exciting opportunity.

    • Technical Troubleshooting

      • Able to identify and diagnose technical issues across wallets, blockchains, and integrations.

      • Skilled in debugging API errors and reviewing logs.

      • Familiar with using the browser console, viewing blockchain explorers and SQL.

      • Able to describe issues in detail for engineers with clear replication steps to accelerate bug resolution.

    • Customer First Mindset & Customer Support Fundamentals

      • 3+ years of demonstrated excellence in providing customer service in chat, email and/or phone channels

      • Effortlessly navigates common customer service tools and systems (Zendesk, Pipedrive, Slack, Linear, etc…)

      • Independently prioritizes work to get back to customers efficiently

      • Identifies opportunities to communicate proactively to engage

      • Able to support Customer Support needs daily with exceptional quality

Contract terms

  • Flexible scheduling, including part-time and full-time seasonal roles

  • Incentive based pay opportunities

  • Training and internal support provided

  • Opportunity to work with a mission-driven, global team and grow your crypto tax expertise

The hourly rate for this position is $55/hr - $69/hr. The actual compensation offered will be based on a variety of job-related factors including relevant skills, education, and experience.

jobs.title: Backend Engineer, Staff (United States & Canada)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Overview

CoinTracker makes cryptocurrency portfolio tracking and tax compliance simple. CoinTracker enables consumers and businesses to seamlessly track their cryptocurrency portfolio, investment performance, taxes, and more. We are a globally distributed team on a mission to enable everyone in the world to use crypto with peace of mind. Learn more about our mission, culture, and hiring process.


Some things we’re proud of

  • 🛠️ Building foundational tools in the cryptocurrency space

  • 📄 Over 1M tax forms generated

  • 💲 $250B+ in cryptocurrency is tracked on CoinTracker (~over 5% of the entire crypto market)

  • 🤝 Partnered with Coinbase, H&R Block, Intuit TurboTax, MetaMask, OpenSea, Phantom, Solana, and Uniswap

  • 🗺️ Founders: Jon previously built TextNow (200M downloads), Chandan was previously a product manager at Google & Google[x]

  • 💼 $100M+ venture capital raised from Accel, General Catalyst, Y Combinator, Initialized Capital, Coinbase Ventures, Kraken Ventures, Intuit Ventures, 776 Ventures, Balaji Srinivasan, Claire Hughes Johnson, Gokul Rajaram, Serena Williams, Zach Perret

  • 🌴 Awesome benefits

Your mission

Join our close-knit, early-stage distributed team, where we tackle complex technical challenges and build transformative crypto products that give people peace of mind. As a Staff Backend Engineer, you will play a critical role in shaping our backend architecture, scaling our systems, and driving high-impact engineering and product initiatives. You'll work cross-functionally to influence technical direction and mentor engineers, helping us build a world-class engineering team.


What you will do

  • Architect and scale backend systems to support millions of users and transactions.

  • Lead and drive critical technical projects, ensuring long-term scalability, performance, and reliability.

  • Design and optimize complex data processing pipelines, distributed systems, and APIs.

  • Collaborate cross-functionally with Product, Design, and other teams to align technical execution with business objectives.

  • Mentor and guide engineers, fostering technical excellence and best practices across the team.

  • Continuously improve system performance, observability, and maintainability.

What we look for

Role-agnostic

  • Impact: Demonstrated ability to drive business impact

  • Mission alignment: Hungry and motivated about making progress towards our mission of Enabling everyone in the world to use crypto with peace of mind.

  • Trust: Say what you believe. Do what you say.

  • Communication: Able to clearly talk about the details and also zoom out to the bigger picture

Role-specific

  • 8+ years of backend engineering experience

  • Strong CS fundamentals, including algorithms, data structures, system design, and performance optimization.

  • Deep knowledge of backend technologies, including databases, orchestrators, messaging systems, data pipelines, and more.

  • Track record of technical leadership, leading complex projects, mentoring engineers, and setting engineering standards.

  • Experience with large-scale data ingestion and processing systems.

  • Drawn to an early-stage, high-growth startup environment with less stability and more ambiguity.

  • Fluent in Python

  • [Bonus] Experience in crypto or financial systems.

Sample projects you might work on

  • Scale our data ingestion and computation platform to handle millions of transactions efficiently

  • Build a smart trade insights platform that recommends trades across exchanges, factoring in transaction history, tax lots, fee detection, arbitrage opportunities, and slippage

  • Integrate the latest country-specific tax regulations to deliver accurate, compliant tax reports for users

Our engineering process includes

  • Code reviews

  • Continuous integration

  • Multiple daily automated deployments to production

  • Automated testing with >85% code coverage

Our tech stack is

  • Web: HTML, Typescript, React, React Native, Styled-Components

  • Mobile: React Native, Expo, GraphQL

  • Backend: Python, Flask, GraphQL, Postgres, BigTable, Redis, Python RQ

  • Infrastructure: GCP, Terraform, PostgreSQL, Docker, Pub/Sub, Datadog, PagerDuty

  • You don’t need to know any or all of these, but be willing to learn!

The starting salary for this position is between $210,000 - $240,000 USD. Candidate's location does not impact the posted salary range. The actual compensation offered will be based on a variety of job-related factors including relevant skills, education, and experience. This position also includes equity in CoinTracker and benefits like medical, dental, vision, 401(k), life insurance, and PTO.

 - 🌴 Awesome benefits https://www.notion.so/cointracker/Benefits-b5db95c6d3224ab1ae3a384048cbaee3


YOUR MISSION

Join our close-knit, early-stage distributed team, where we tackle complex technical challenges and build transformative crypto products that give people peace of mind. As a Staff Backend Engineer, you will play a critical role in shaping our backend architecture, scaling our systems, and driving high-impact engineering and product initiatives. You'll work cross-functionally to influence technical direction and mentor engineers, helping us build a world-class engineering team.





WHAT YOU WILL DO

 - Architect and scale backend systems to support millions of users and transactions.

 - Lead and drive critical technical projects, ensuring long-term scalability, performance, and reliability.

 - Design and optimize complex data processing pipelines, distributed systems, and APIs.

 - Collaborate cross-functionally with Product, Design, and other teams to align technical execution with business objectives.

 - Mentor and guide engineers, fostering technical excellence and best practices across the team.

 - Continuously improve system performance, observability, and maintainability.


WHAT WE LOOK FOR


ROLE-AGNOSTIC

 - Impact: Demonstrated ability to drive business impact

 - Mission alignment: Hungry and motivated about making progress towards our mission of Enabling everyone in the world to use crypto with peace of mind.

 - Trust: Say what you believe. Do what you say.

 - Communication: Able to clearly talk about the details and also zoom out to the bigger picture


ROLE-SPECIFIC

 - 8+ years of backend engineering experience

 - Strong CS fundamentals, including algorithms, data structures, system design, and performance optimization.

 - Deep knowledge of backend technologies, including databases, orchestrators, messaging systems, data pipelines, and more.

 - Track record of technical leadership, leading complex projects, mentoring engineers, and setting engineering standards.

 - Experience with large-scale data ingestion and processing systems.

 - Drawn to an early-stage, high-growth startup environment with less stability and more ambiguity.

 - Fluent in Python

 - [Bonus] Experience in crypto or financial systems.


SAMPLE PROJECTS YOU MIGHT WORK ON

 - Scale our data ingestion and computation platform to handle millions of transactions efficiently

 - Build a smart trade insights platform that recommends trades across exchanges, factoring in transaction history, tax lots, fee detection, arbitrage opportunities, and slippage

 - Integrate the latest country-specific tax regulations to deliver accurate, compliant tax reports for users


OUR ENGINEERING PROCESS INCLUDES

 - Code reviews

 - Continuous integration

 - Multiple daily automated deployments to production

 - Automated testing with >85% code coverage


OUR TECH STACK IS

 - Web: HTML, Typescript, React, React Native, Styled-Components

 - Mobile: React Native, Expo, GraphQL

 - Backend: Python, Flask, GraphQL, Postgres, BigTable, Redis, Python RQ

 - Infrastructure: GCP, Terraform, PostgreSQL, Docker, Pub/Sub, Datadog, PagerDuty

 - You don’t need to know any or all of these, but be willing to learn!

The starting salary for this position is between $210,000 - $240,000 USD. Candidate's location does not impact the posted salary range. The actual compensation offered will be based on a variety of job-related factors including relevant skills, education, and experience. This position also includes equity in CoinTracker and benefits like medical, dental, vision, 401(k), life insurance, and PTO.

As an early engineer on the team, you’ll work across the stack and collaborate closely with cross-functional stakeholders to own key product and engineering initiatives.

What you will do

  • Collaborate across Product, Design, and Engineering to shape roadmap priorities, define great user experiences, and drive product direction

  • Work full-stack to own features end-to-end - from early exploration and prototyping to implementation, launch, and ongoing iteration

  • Build scalable, high-quality systems while solving complex technical challenges in performance, architecture, and reliability

  • Continuously improve our codebase, infrastructure, and development practices - balancing speed with quality through well-tested code and thoughtful trade-offs

  • Contribute to technical leadership by driving architectural decisions, shaping engineering standards, and helping grow the team through interviewing and improving the hiring process

What we look for

Role-agnostic

  • Impact: Demonstrated ability to drive business impact

  • Mission alignment: Hungry and motivated about making progress towards our mission of Enabling everyone in the world to use crypto with peace of mind.

  • Trust: Say what you believe. Do what you say.

  • Communication: Able to clearly talk about the details and also zoom out to the bigger picture

Role-specific

  • 3+ years of software development experience as an IC.

  • Have strong CS fundamentals, including algorithms, data structures, system design, and distributed systems.

  • Write high-quality code, value software testing, and uphold best practices in engineering, security, and design.

  • Have a startup mindset: you’re resourceful, adaptable, and not afraid of ambiguity.

  • Enjoy learning new tools, technologies, and methodologies to stay at the cutting edge.

  • Able to work effectively in a remote setting and able to overlap with our core hours of 9 AM to 12 PM PT.

  • [Bonus] Prior experience building 0 → 1 products and engineering systems.

You may enjoy this role if you

  • Love building great products and engineering systems

  • Have strong CS fundamentals, including algorithms, data structures, system design, and distributed systems

  • Write high-quality code, value software testing, and uphold best practices in engineering, security, and design

  • Thrive working autonomously and collaboratively

Sample projects you might work on

  • Build a DeFi intelligence product that informs users where to make the most return for staking their crypto

  • Create the best crypto accounting product

  • Implement tax-loss harvesting to reduce capital gains taxes for cryptocurrency users

  • New 0 --> 1 stablecoin product

Some of the challenges we’re tackling

  • Scale and performance — processing billions of data points and supporting users with millions of transactions efficiently

  • Complex logic — building systems for transfer detection, cost basis tracking, and tax optimization using solid algorithmic foundations

  • Blockchain integration — working with raw blockchain data, xPubs, smart contracts, and running our own nodes to support a wide range of assets and protocols

  • System complexity — integrating with hundreds of exchanges and wallets while maintaining accuracy, reliability, and observability

  • Product discovery — identifying user needs, exploring use cases, and iterating quickly to find product-market fit and deliver real value

Our tech stack is

  • Web: HTML, Typescript, React, React Native, TailwindCSS

  • Mobile: React Native, Expo, GraphQL

  • Backend: Python, Flask, GraphQL, Postgres, Redis, Python RQ, Temporal

  • Infrastructure: GCP, Terraform, PostgreSQL, Docker, Pub/Sub, Datadog, PagerDuty

  • You don’t need to know any or all of these, but be willing to learn!

The starting salary for this position is between $146,000 - $175,000 USD. Candidate's location does not impact the posted salary range. The actual compensation offered will be based on a variety of job-related factors including relevant skills, education, and experience. This position also includes equity in CoinTracker and benefits like medical, dental, vision, 401(k), life insurance, and PTO.

jobs.title: Account Executive, Institutional (United States & Canada)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Overview

CoinTracker makes cryptocurrency portfolio tracking and tax compliance simple. CoinTracker enables consumers and businesses to seamlessly track their cryptocurrency portfolio, investment performance, taxes, and more. We are a globally distributed team on a mission to enable everyone in the world to use crypto with peace of mind. Learn more about our mission, culture, and hiring process.


Some things we’re proud of

  • 🛠️ Building foundational tools in the cryptocurrency space

  • 📄 Over 1M tax forms generated

  • 💲 $250B+ in cryptocurrency is tracked on CoinTracker (~over 5% of the entire crypto market)

  • 🤝 Partnered with Coinbase, H&R Block, Intuit TurboTax, MetaMask, OpenSea, Phantom, Solana, and Uniswap

  • 🗺️ Founders: Jon previously built TextNow (200M downloads), Chandan was previously a product manager at Google & Google[x]

  • 💼 $100M+ venture capital raised from Accel, General Catalyst, Y Combinator, Initialized Capital, Coinbase Ventures, Kraken Ventures, Intuit Ventures, 776 Ventures, Balaji Srinivasan, Claire Hughes Johnson, Gokul Rajaram, Serena Williams, Zach Perret

  • 🌴 Awesome benefits

Your mission

Sell CoinTracker’s Institutional Solutions to crypto brokers.

Your one year outcomes

  • CoinTracker’s Cost Basis Engine is the product of choice for crypto brokers in the US

  • Build strong share in international markets as regulations come online

  • CoinTracker generates millions in ARR from leading brokers

What you will do

  • As the founding sales hire of CoinTracker Institutional, you will play an instrumental role in growing the company in direct partnership with hiring manager and Head of Institutional, Jarrett. In particular, you will:

    • Generate a strong pipeline of leads and help convert them into closed deals, leading the process E2E

    • Build relationships with key stakeholders in the market and at our prospective companies

    • Become a product expert and help customers use CoinTracker effectively; assist prospects through evaluation, onboarding, and on an ongoing basis

    • Channel the voice of our customers to our product team to shape our roadmap

What we look for

Role-agnostic

  • Impact: Demonstrated ability to drive business impact

  • Mission alignment: Hungry and motivated about making progress towards our mission of Enabling everyone in the world to use crypto with peace of mind.

  • Trust: Say what you believe. Do what you say.

  • Communication: Able to clearly talk about the details and also zoom out to the bigger picture

Role-specific

  • We’re looking for a sales leader who thrives in ambiguity, takes full ownership of deals, and builds deep relationships that lead to meaningful partnerships. The ideal candidate will bring a mix of hustle, strategic thinking, and empathy for our partners.

Here’s what success looks like in this role:

🔁 End-to-End Deal Execution

  • You’ve owned complex, multi-stakeholder sales cycles from start to finish — including pricing, negotiation, and contract execution

  • You balance long-term relationship-building with near-term revenue results

  • You take full ownership and act like a business owner, not just a deal owner

🧭 Hunter Mindset & Pipeline Management

  • You’re ambitious and creative in how you find and close new opportunities

  • You know what it takes to win a deal, and you bring strong strategic judgment to every target

  • You move fast and hustle — both externally with prospects and internally across teams

  • You use probability-of-win (pWin) thinking to focus your time and drive results

  • You influence stakeholders through clear storytelling and a deep understanding of the product, market, and customer needs

🤝 Relationship-Builder

  • You genuinely enjoy building deep, trusted relationships — not just transactional connections

  • You’re proactive in your outreach, even when there’s no immediate ask

  • You know how to stay top-of-mind with partners, and you’re skilled at maintaining strong industry relationships

  • You’re open to traveling (biweekly or monthly) to meet with partners across the U.S. and globally

🧠 Product Fluency

  • You’re comfortable collaborating with product and engineering to advocate for partner needs

  • You know how to run an effective demo that aligns with business outcomes

  • You bring a high-level understanding of how platforms, APIs, and features are built — and how to translate that for non-technical audiences

The starting salary for this position is between $176,000 - $208,000. The actual compensation offered will be based on a variety of job-related factors including relevant skills, education, and experience. This position also includes equity in CoinTracker and benefits like medical, dental, vision, 401(k), life insurance, and PTO.

 - 🗺️ Founders: Jon https://www.linkedin.com/in/jonlerner/ previously built TextNow (200M downloads), Chandan https://www.linkedin.com/in/clodha/ was previously a product manager at Google & Google[x]

 - 💼 $100M+ venture capital raised from Accel, General Catalyst, Y Combinator, Initialized Capital, Coinbase Ventures, Kraken Ventures, Intuit Ventures, 776 Ventures, Balaji Srinivasan https://twitter.com/balajis, Claire Hughes Johnson https://twitter.com/chughesjohnson, Gokul Rajaram https://twitter.com/gokulr, Serena Williams https://twitter.com/serenawilliams, Zach Perret https://twitter.com/zachperret

 - 🌴 Awesome benefits https://www.notion.so/cointracker/Benefits-b5db95c6d3224ab1ae3a384048cbaee3


YOUR MISSION

Sell CoinTracker’s Institutional Solutions to crypto brokers.


YOUR ONE YEAR OUTCOMES

 - CoinTracker’s Cost Basis Engine is the product of choice for crypto brokers in the US

 - Build strong share in international markets as regulations come online

 - CoinTracker generates millions in ARR from leading brokers


WHAT YOU WILL DO

 - As the founding sales hire of CoinTracker Institutional, you will play an instrumental role in growing the company in direct partnership with hiring manager and Head of Institutional, Jarrett https://www.linkedin.com/in/jarrett-abraham-45ab7612/. In particular, you will:
   
   - Generate a strong pipeline of leads and help convert them into closed deals, leading the process E2E
   
   - Build relationships with key stakeholders in the market and at our prospective companies
   
   - Become a product expert and help customers use CoinTracker effectively; assist prospects through evaluation, onboarding, and on an ongoing basis
   
   - Channel the voice of our customers to our product team to shape our roadmap


WHAT WE LOOK FOR


ROLE-AGNOSTIC

 - Impact: Demonstrated ability to drive business impact

 - Mission alignment: Hungry and motivated about making progress towards our mission of Enabling everyone in the world to use crypto with peace of mind.

 - Trust: Say what you believe. Do what you say.

 - Communication: Able to clearly talk about the details and also zoom out to the bigger picture


ROLE-SPECIFIC

 - We’re looking for a sales leader who thrives in ambiguity, takes full ownership of deals, and builds deep relationships that lead to meaningful partnerships. The ideal candidate will bring a mix of hustle, strategic thinking, and empathy for our partners.

Here’s what success looks like in this role:



🔁 END-TO-END DEAL EXECUTION

 - You’ve owned complex, multi-stakeholder sales cycles from start to finish — including pricing, negotiation, and contract execution

 - You balance long-term relationship-building with near-term revenue results

 - You take full ownership and act like a business owner, not just a deal owner


🧭 HUNTER MINDSET & PIPELINE MANAGEMENT

 - You’re ambitious and creative in how you find and close new opportunities

 - You know what it takes to win a deal, and you bring strong strategic judgment to every target

 - You move fast and hustle — both externally with prospects and internally across teams

 - You use probability-of-win (pWin) thinking to focus your time and drive results

 - You influence stakeholders through clear storytelling and a deep understanding of the product, market, and customer needs


🤝 RELATIONSHIP-BUILDER

 - You genuinely enjoy building deep, trusted relationships — not just transactional connections

 - You’re proactive in your outreach, even when there’s no immediate ask

 - You know how to stay top-of-mind with partners, and you’re skilled at maintaining strong industry relationships

 - You’re open to traveling (biweekly or monthly) to meet with partners across the U.S. and globally


🧠 PRODUCT FLUENCY

 - You’re comfortable collaborating with product and engineering to advocate for partner needs

 - You know how to run an effective demo that aligns with business outcomes

 - You bring a high-level understanding of how platforms, APIs, and features are built — and how to translate that for non-technical audiences

The starting salary for this position is between $176,000 - $208,000. The actual compensation offered will be based on a variety of job-related factors including relevant skills, education, and experience. This position also includes equity in CoinTracker and benefits like medical, dental, vision, 401(k), life insurance, and PTO.

jobs.title: Engineering Manager, Infra & Platform
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Overview

CoinTracker makes cryptocurrency portfolio tracking and tax compliance simple. CoinTracker enables consumers and businesses to seamlessly track their cryptocurrency portfolio, investment performance, taxes, and more. We are a globally distributed team on a mission to enable everyone in the world to use crypto with peace of mind. Learn more about our mission, culture, and hiring process.


Some things we’re proud of

  • 🛠️ Building foundational tools in the cryptocurrency space

  • 📄 Over 1M tax forms generated

  • 💲 $80B+ in cryptocurrency is tracked on CoinTracker (~over 5% of the entire crypto market)

  • 🤝 Partnered with Coinbase, H&R Block, Intuit TurboTax, MetaMask, OpenSea, Phantom, Solana, and Uniswap

  • 🗺️ Founders: Jon previously built TextNow (200M downloads), Chandan was previously a product manager at Google & Google[x]

  • 💼 $100M+ venture capital raised from Accel, General Catalyst, Y Combinator, Initialized Capital, Coinbase Ventures, Kraken Ventures, Intuit Ventures, 776 Ventures, Balaji Srinivasan, Claire Hughes Johnson, Gokul Rajaram, Serena Williams, Zach Perret

  • 🌴 Awesome benefits

Your mission

Lead the Infrastructure and Platform teams that provide the secure, scalable, and intuitive foundations every CoinTracker engineer builds on – empowering them to ship reliable, high-quality products quickly and confidently.

Your one year outcomes

  • Implement scalable infrastructure and platform foundations that support the next phase of CoinTracker’s growth

  • Establish a roadmap for developer productivity improvements (e.g., ephemeral environments, platform tooling) that drive meaningful improvements in developer satisfaction and velocity

  • Deliver key shared services such as auth, audit logging, observability adopted across all product teams

  • Develop and communicate a clear vision and long-term strategy for the Infrastructure and Platform teams

What you will do

  • Lead a team of 5-6 engineers across Infrastructure and Platform, providing clarity, prioritization, and coaching

  • Define and drive the roadmap for infrastructure reliability and scalability, developer experience, and core platform services

  • Guide the evolution of our architecture toward modular, service-oriented systems

  • Foster a culture of ownership, learning, and technical excellence

What we look for

  • Role-agnostic

    • Impact: Demonstrated ability to drive business impact

    • Mission alignment: Hungry and motivated about making progress towards our mission of Enabling everyone in the world to use crypto with peace of mind.

    • Trust: Say what you believe. Do what you say.

    • Communication: Able to clearly talk about the details and also zoom out to the bigger picture

  • Role-specific

    • 2+ years of engineering management experience leading infrastructure or platform teams

    • 6+ years of hands-on experience in infrastructure or platform engineering

    • Strong understanding of cloud infrastructure (GCP, AWS, Azure), observability, CI/CD, and modern infrastructure-as-code practices

    • Experience building or scaling shared platform services (e.g., authentication, internal APIs, service frameworks)

    • Familiarity with architecting and developing software to enterprise-grade requirements, especially around security, governance, and compliance

    • Comfortable navigating ambiguity and making pragmatic trade-offs to deliver high-impact outcomes

    • Strong architectural instincts and ability to guide teams toward sustainable, scalable solutions

    • [Bonus] Experience in crypto or financial systems

The starting salary for this position is between $264,000-$297,000 USD. Candidate's location does not impact the posted salary range. The actual compensation offered will be based on a variety of job-related factors including relevant skills, education, and experience. This position also includes equity in CoinTracker and benefits like medical, dental, vision, 401(k), life insurance, and PTO.

jobs.title: Backend Engineer, Senior (India)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Overview

CoinTracker makes cryptocurrency portfolio tracking and tax compliance simple. CoinTracker enables consumers and businesses to seamlessly track their cryptocurrency portfolio, investment performance, taxes, and more. We are a globally distributed team on a mission to enable everyone in the world to use crypto with peace of mind. Learn more about our mission, culture, and hiring process.


Some things we’re proud of

  • 🛠️ Building foundational tools in the cryptocurrency space

  • 📄 Over 1M tax forms generated

  • 💲 $250B+ in cryptocurrency is tracked on CoinTracker (~over 5% of the entire crypto market)

  • 🤝 Partnered with Coinbase, H&R Block, Intuit TurboTax, MetaMask, OpenSea, Phantom, Solana, and Uniswap

  • 🗺️ Founders: Jon previously built TextNow (200M downloads), Chandan was previously a product manager at Google & Google[x]

  • 💼 $100M+ venture capital raised from Accel, General Catalyst, Y Combinator, Initialized Capital, Coinbase Ventures, Kraken Ventures, Intuit Ventures, 776 Ventures, Balaji Srinivasan, Claire Hughes Johnson, Gokul Rajaram, Serena Williams, Zach Perret

  • 🌴 Awesome benefits

Your mission

Join our close-knit, early-stage distributed team, where we tackle exciting technical challenges and create transformative crypto products that give people peace of mind.

What you will do

  • You will be a part of the newly formed Integration Expansion Team that works closely with our Integration engineering team.

  • You’ll own and deliver new Integrations (blockchains & exchanges) by using our existing Integrations platform system to scale our Integrations coverage and assist in troubleshooting critical Integrations related issues.

  • Collaborate with engineering, customer experience & product teams within Cointracker.

  • Participate in hiring efforts to help scale the Integration Expansion Team.

What we look for

  • We are hiring experienced backend software engineers with 7+ years of non-internship experience to help build and scale our new Integrations Expansion team.

  • Experience as a tech lead or team lead is preferred.

  • Have strong CS and system design fundamentals, write high-quality code, value software testing, and uphold best practices in engineering. Strong Python knowledge & working with third party API’s is preferred.

  • Familiarity with AWS or GCP & cloud fundamentals is preferred.

  • Drawn to an early-stage, high-growth startup environment.

  • Ability to read blockchain data / understanding of web3 strongly preferred.

  • Background in data engineering domain and closely working with customer support team is a plus.

  • Able to work effectively in a remote setting and able to overlap with our core hours of 9 AM to 12 PM Pacific Timezone.

Our engineering process includes

  • Code reviews

  • Continuous integration

  • Multiple daily automated deployments to production

  • Automated testing with >85% code coverage

Our tech stack is

  • Web: HTML, Typescript, React, React Native, Styled-Components

  • Mobile: React Native, Expo, GraphQL

  • Backend: Python, Flask, GraphQL, Postgres, BigTable, Redis, Python RQ

  • Infrastructure: GCP, Temporal, Terraform, PostgreSQL, Docker, Pub/Sub, Datadog, PagerDuty

  • You don’t need to know any or all of these, but be willing to learn!

jobs.title: Product Designer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Overview

CoinTracker makes cryptocurrency portfolio tracking and tax compliance simple. CoinTracker enables consumers and businesses to seamlessly track their cryptocurrency portfolio, investment performance, taxes, and more. We are a globally distributed team on a mission to enable everyone in the world to use crypto with peace of mind. Learn more about our mission, culture, and hiring process.


Some things we’re proud of

  • 🛠️ Building foundational tools in the cryptocurrency space

  • 📄 Over 1M tax forms generated

  • 💲 $80B+ in cryptocurrency is tracked on CoinTracker (~over 5% of the entire crypto market)

  • 🤝 Partnered with Coinbase, H&R Block, Intuit TurboTax, MetaMask, OpenSea, Phantom, Solana, and Uniswap

  • 🗺️ Founders: Jon previously built TextNow (200M downloads), Chandan was previously a product manager at Google & Google[x]

  • 💼 $100M+ venture capital raised from Accel, General Catalyst, Y Combinator, Initialized Capital, Coinbase Ventures, Kraken Ventures, Intuit Ventures, 776 Ventures, Balaji Srinivasan, Claire Hughes Johnson, Gokul Rajaram, Serena Williams, Zach Perret

  • 🌴 Awesome benefits

Your mission

  • Design product experiences for CoinTracker’s multiple product lines that embody our mission to enable everyone to use crypto with peace of mind.

Your one year outcomes

  • CoinTracker is a top-notch product / user experience for crypto taxes.

  • CoinTracker Enterprise is a top-notch product / user experience for crypto bookkeeping and accounting.

What you will do

  • As a product designer at CoinTracker, you will play a crucial role in shaping the user experience of our crypto products.

  • Lead the end-to-end design process for CoinTracker products, from concept ideation to final implementation.

  • Work closely with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders to define product requirements and ensure alignment with user needs and business goals. Mentor more junior members of the design team.

  • Create interactive prototypes, and high-fidelity designs that effectively communicate design concepts and user flows.

  • Utilize user research, usability testing, and data analysis to inform design decisions and iterate on product designs based on feedback.

  • Help maintain our design systems and guidelines, and improve upon them, to ensure consistency and scalability across all product interfaces.

  • Champion user-centric design principles and advocate for the importance of user experience design and user empathy within the organization.

  • Stay current with industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in UX/UI design and the crypto space.

What we look for

  • Role-agnostic

    • Impact: Demonstrated ability to drive business impact

    • Mission alignment: Hungry and motivated about making progress towards our mission of Enabling everyone in the world to use crypto with peace of mind.

    • Trust: Say what you believe. Do what you say.

    • Communication: Able to clearly talk about the details and also zoom out to the bigger picture

  • Role-specific

    • 8+ years of experience in product design, with a strong portfolio showcasing your design skills. Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Visual Communication, or a related field. Master's degree and previous experience at a top tier crypto company is a plus.

    • Demonstrates a high bar for craft and quality. Strong conceptual and design thinking is evident in portfolio. Passionate about creating appealing, simple, and memorable work.

    • Ability to execute efficiently using a broad range of design tooling, including prototyping tools (Figma, Principle, Framer, or After Effects). Proficiency in design tools such as Figma, Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects), etc.

    • Ability to iteratively deliver on demos/prototypes and communicate through design in internal and external meetings.

    • Excellent communication skills with the ability to articulate design concepts and collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.

    • Motivated and thrives in an early-stage startup environment with less stability and more ambiguity.

    • Aligned with our values of Obsess Over Users, Inspire Trust, and Think Long Term & Ship Today

    • Nice to haves: Motion design, Brand and Design systems experience; knowledge of blockchain technology, cryptocurrency, and the fintech industry is a plus.

    The starting salary for this position is between $175,000 - $200,000 USD. Candidate's location does not impact the posted salary range. The actual compensation offered will be based on a variety of job-related factors including relevant skills, education, and experience. This position also includes equity in CoinTracker and benefits like medical, dental, vision, 401(k), life insurance, and PTO.

    • Onchain expertise: Ability to view complex transactions on a block explorer (Etherscan and Solscan) and translate them into a clear story (what did the user do?)

      • Familiarity with EVM

      • Familiarity with Solana or one other smart contract compatible blockchain

    • Problem-solving: Ability to use our current DeFi coverage tools to solve a variety of DeFi use cases. For situations that cannot be solved by current tooling, the candidate should be able to propose specific product improvements that will unlock additional use cases.

    • Data analytics: Ability to analyze onchain data with analytics tools such as Dune and/or Flipside

      • Familiarity with a query language (SQL, postgreSQL, Dune SQL, etc.)

The starting salary for this position is between $112,000 and $140,000. The actual compensation offered will be based on a variety of job-related factors including relevant skills, education, and experience. This position also includes equity in CoinTracker and benefits like medical, dental, vision, 401(k), life insurance, and PTO.

jobs.title: Backend Engineer (India)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Overview

CoinTracker makes cryptocurrency portfolio tracking and tax compliance simple. CoinTracker enables consumers and businesses to seamlessly track their cryptocurrency portfolio, investment performance, taxes, and more. We are a globally distributed team on a mission to enable everyone in the world to use crypto with peace of mind. Learn more about our mission, culture, and hiring process.


Some things we’re proud of

  • 🛠️ Building foundational tools in the cryptocurrency space

  • 📄 Over 1M tax forms generated

  • 💲 $250B+ in cryptocurrency is tracked on CoinTracker (~over 5% of the entire crypto market)

  • 🤝 Partnered with Coinbase, H&R Block, Intuit TurboTax, MetaMask, OpenSea, Phantom, Solana, and Uniswap

  • 🗺️ Founders: Jon previously built TextNow (200M downloads), Chandan was previously a product manager at Google & Google[x]

  • 💼 $100M+ venture capital raised from Accel, General Catalyst, Y Combinator, Initialized Capital, Coinbase Ventures, Kraken Ventures, Intuit Ventures, 776 Ventures, Balaji Srinivasan, Claire Hughes Johnson, Gokul Rajaram, Serena Williams, Zach Perret

  • 🌴 Awesome benefits

Your mission

Join our close-knit, early-stage distributed team, where we tackle exciting technical challenges and create transformative crypto products that give people peace of mind.

What you will do

  • You will be a part of the newly formed Integration Expansion Team that works closely with our Integration engineering team.

  • You’ll own and deliver new Integrations (blockchains & exchanges) by using our existing Integrations platform system to scale our Integrations coverage and assist in troubleshooting critical Integrations related issues.

  • Collaborate with engineering, customer experience & product teams within Cointracker.

  • Participate in hiring efforts to help scale the Integration Expansion Team.

What we look for

  • We are hiring experienced backend software engineers with 4+ years of non-internship experience to help build and scale our new Integrations Expansion team.

  • Have strong CS and system design fundamentals, write high-quality code, value software testing, and uphold best practices in engineering. Strong Python knowledge & working with third party API’s is preferred.

  • Familiarity with AWS or GCP & cloud fundamentals is preferred.

  • Drawn to an early-stage, high-growth startup environment.

  • Ability to read blockchain data / understanding of web3 strongly preferred.

  • Background in data engineering domain and closely working with customer support team is a plus.

  • Able to work effectively in a remote setting and able to overlap with our core hours of 9 AM to 12 PM Pacific Timezone.

Our engineering process includes

  • Code reviews

  • Continuous integration

  • Multiple daily automated deployments to production

  • Automated testing with >85% code coverage

Our tech stack is

  • Web: HTML, Typescript, React, React Native, Styled-Components

  • Mobile: React Native, Expo, GraphQL

  • Backend: Python, Flask, GraphQL, Postgres, BigTable, Redis, Python RQ

  • Infrastructure: GCP, Temporal, Terraform, PostgreSQL, Docker, Pub/Sub, Datadog, PagerDuty

  • You don’t need to know any or all of these, but be willing to learn!

jobs.title: Controller
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Overview

CoinTracker makes cryptocurrency portfolio tracking and tax compliance simple. CoinTracker enables consumers and businesses to seamlessly track their cryptocurrency portfolio, investment performance, taxes, and more. We are a globally distributed team on a mission to enable everyone in the world to use crypto with peace of mind. Learn more about our mission, culture, and hiring process.


Some things we’re proud of

  • 🛠️ Building foundational tools in the cryptocurrency space

  • 📄 Over 1M tax forms generated

  • 💲 $250B+ in cryptocurrency is tracked on CoinTracker (~over 5% of the entire crypto market)

  • 🤝 Partnered with Coinbase, H&R Block, Intuit TurboTax, MetaMask, OpenSea, Phantom, Solana, and Uniswap

  • 🗺️ Founders: Jon previously built TextNow (200M downloads), Chandan was previously a product manager at Google & Google[x]

  • 💼 $100M+ venture capital raised from Accel, General Catalyst, Y Combinator, Initialized Capital, Coinbase Ventures, Kraken Ventures, Intuit Ventures, 776 Ventures, Balaji Srinivasan, Claire Hughes Johnson, Gokul Rajaram, Serena Williams, Zach Perret

  • 🌴 Awesome benefits

Your mission

Build a best-in-class financial foundation that facilitates rapid scaling

Your one-year outcomes

  • Successful first financial audit with a clean opinion and no material weaknesses

  • Month-end close time reduced from 10 business days to 5

  • Accounting tech stack (ERP, AP, AR, tax, spend management) is fully upgraded

  • ASC 606 revenue recognition is implemented for B2B contracts

  • Key workflows (e.g., expense reporting, AP approvals, SBC recognition, etc) are fully automated

What you will do

  • Lead CoinTracker through its first financial audit process

  • Own the closing and reporting of monthly, quarterly, and annual financial statements

  • Assess and upgrade our existing financial systems and processes

  • Hire and manage a world-class Accounting team

What we look for

  • Role-agnostic

    • Impact: Demonstrated ability to drive business impact

    • Mission alignment: Hungry and motivated about making progress towards our mission of enabling everyone in the world to use crypto with peace of mind.

    • Trust: Say what you believe. Do what you say.

    • Communication: Able to clearly talk about the details and also zoom out to the bigger picture

  • Role-specific

    • Thought partner to Head of Finance — able to connect accounting details to clear insights for execs and the board

    • Track record of preparing a company for its first external audit — including documentation, policies, and controls

    • Proven ability to handle complex revenue recognition under ASC 606 (subscription, implementation, support, consulting)

    • Ability to scale an Accounting org while supporting rapid growth, with an emphasis on an automation-first mindset

    • 8+ years of total relevant experience

The starting salary for this position is between $180,000 - $220,000 USD. Candidate's location does not impact the posted salary range. The actual compensation offered will be based on a variety of job-related factors including relevant skills, education, and experience. This position also includes equity in CoinTracker and benefits like medical, dental, vision, 401(k), life insurance, and PTO.

jobs.title: US Crypto Tax Expert
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Overview

CoinTracker makes cryptocurrency portfolio tracking and tax compliance simple. CoinTracker enables consumers and businesses to seamlessly track their cryptocurrency portfolio, investment performance, taxes, and more. We are a globally distributed team on a mission to enable everyone in the world to use crypto with peace of mind. Learn more about our mission, culture, and hiring process.


Some things we’re proud of

  • 🛠️ Building foundational tools in the cryptocurrency space

  • 📄 Over 1M tax forms generated

  • 💲 $250B+ in cryptocurrency is tracked on CoinTracker (~over 5% of the entire crypto market)

  • 🤝 Partnered with Coinbase, H&R Block, Intuit TurboTax, MetaMask, OpenSea, Phantom, Solana, and Uniswap

  • 🗺️ Founders: Jon previously built TextNow (200M downloads), Chandan was previously a product manager at Google & Google[x]

  • 💼 $100M+ venture capital raised from Accel, General Catalyst, Y Combinator, Initialized Capital, Coinbase Ventures, Kraken Ventures, Intuit Ventures, 776 Ventures, Balaji Srinivasan, Claire Hughes Johnson, Gokul Rajaram, Serena Williams, Zach Perret

Team overview

We are hiring CPAs and EAs to join our growing CoinTracker Tax Experts. In this role, you will work directly with CoinTracker customers to review their crypto tax data, explain outcomes, and ensure compliance. You’ll primarily interact with clients through calls and virtual meetings, helping them navigate their crypto taxes with clarity and confidence.

This is a seasonal contract opportunity, ideal for professionals who want flexible, remote work while gaining hands-on experience at the intersection of crypto and tax.

What you will do

  • Support CoinTracker clients by reviewing imported crypto transactions and tax reports

  • Lead customer calls to explain tax results, answer questions, and provide reassurance and guidance

  • Verify the accuracy of tax calculations, identify issues, and flag cases requiring senior review

  • Collaborate with CoinTracker’s tax and Customer Success teams to escalate and resolve complex cases

  • Stay current on tax laws and crypto reporting requirements

  • Deliver an exceptional customer experience by being responsive, professional, and clear

What we look for

Role-agnostic

  • Impact: Demonstrated ability to drive business impact

  • Mission alignment: Hungry and motivated about making progress towards our mission of Enabling everyone in the world to use crypto with peace of mind.

  • Trust: Say what you believe. Do what you say.

  • Communication: Able to clearly talk about the details and also zoom out to the bigger picture

Role-specific

  • Active, unrestricted EA or CPA credential (required)

  • Valid PTIN

  • 3–4 years of experience in tax preparation and review; Crypto experience is required

  • Excellent communication skills and comfort leading client conversations over video/phone

  • Strong analytical ability and attention to detail when reviewing tax data

  • Customer-service orientation: empathetic, proactive, and patient

  • Reliable internet connection and ability to work remotely

  • Familiarity with CoinTracker

  • Experience working in a startup, fintech, or fast-moving environment

Who you are

  • As a Tax Expert, you have a minimum of 3 years of paid experience preparing and reviewing federal and state individual 1040 tax returns, using commercial tax preparation software

  • You possess an active, unrestricted credential: EA, CPA, or Practicing Attorney with strong tax preparation experience and extensive knowledge of tax laws and active Preparer Tax Identification Number (PTIN)

  • You are passionate about helping clients navigate the complexities of taxation, and you’re committed to enhancing our brand by delighting our customers and empowering them to prepare their taxes

  • You possess excellent customer service skills, and you are excited to interact with customers through video and audio tools in a professional, friendly, and confident manner

Contract terms

  • Flexible scheduling, including part-time and full-time seasonal roles

  • Incentive based pay opportunities

  • Training and internal support provided

  • Opportunity to work with a mission-driven, global team and grow your crypto tax expertise

The hourly rate for this position is $45/hr - $100/hr. The actual compensation offered will be based on a variety of job-related factors including relevant skills, education, and experience.

jobs.title: Backend Engineer, Senior (United States & Canada)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Overview

CoinTracker makes cryptocurrency portfolio tracking and tax compliance simple. CoinTracker enables consumers and businesses to seamlessly track their cryptocurrency portfolio, investment performance, taxes, and more. We are a globally distributed team on a mission to enable everyone in the world to use crypto with peace of mind. Learn more about our mission, culture, and hiring process.


Some things we’re proud of

  • 🛠️ Building foundational tools in the cryptocurrency space

  • 📄 Over 1M tax forms generated

  • 💲 $250B+ in cryptocurrency is tracked on CoinTracker (~over 5% of the entire crypto market)

  • 🤝 Partnered with Coinbase, H&R Block, Intuit TurboTax, MetaMask, OpenSea, Phantom, Solana, and Uniswap

  • 🗺️ Founders: Jon previously built TextNow (200M downloads), Chandan was previously a product manager at Google & Google[x]

  • 💼 $100M+ venture capital raised from Accel, General Catalyst, Y Combinator, Initialized Capital, Coinbase Ventures, Kraken Ventures, Intuit Ventures, 776 Ventures, Balaji Srinivasan, Claire Hughes Johnson, Gokul Rajaram, Serena Williams, Zach Perret

  • 🌴 Awesome benefits

Your mission

Join our close-knit, early-stage distributed team, where we tackle exciting technical challenges and create transformative crypto products that give people peace of mind. As one of the engineers, you'll play a key role in scaling our backend systems and take direct ownership of high-impact product and engineering goals.

What you will do

  • Build new features, products, integrations, and back-end services

  • Design scalable systems to support millions of users

  • Own and deliver top-level product and engineering objectives

  • Collaborate with team members across the company

What we look for

Role-agnostic

  • Impact: Demonstrated ability to drive business impact

  • Mission alignment: Hungry and motivated about making progress towards our mission of Enabling everyone in the world to use crypto with peace of mind.

  • Trust: Say what you believe. Do what you say.

  • Communication: Able to clearly talk about the details and also zoom out to the bigger picture

Role-specific

  • 5+ years of professional (non-internship) experience as a backend engineer, preferably in the data engineering or crypto/finance domain. Experience in crypto is strongly preferred.

  • Have strong CS fundamentals, including algorithms, data structures, system design, and distributed systems. Deep knowledge of backend technologies, including databases, orchestrators, messaging systems, data pipelines, and more.

  • Write high-quality code, value software testing, and uphold best practices in engineering, security, and design.

  • Experience designing, scaling, and maintaining production systems, ideally within high-growth or early-stage environments. or drawn to high growth stage startups.

  • Strong fundamentals with a cloud platform like GCP or AWS

  • Able to work effectively in a remote setting and able to overlap with our core hours of 9 AM to 12 PM PT / 12 - 3pm EST

Our engineering process includes

  • Code reviews

  • Continuous integration

  • Multiple daily automated deployments to production

  • Automated testing with >85% code coverage

Our tech stack is

  • Web: HTML, Typescript, React, React Native, Styled-Components

  • Mobile: React Native, Expo, GraphQL

  • Backend: Python, Flask, GraphQL, Postgres, BigTable, Redis, Python RQ, Temporal

  • Infrastructure: GCP, Terraform, PostgreSQL, Docker, Pub/Sub, Datadog, PagerDuty

  • You don’t need to know any or all of these, but be willing to learn!

The starting salary for this position is between $175,000 - $210,000 USD. Candidate's location does not impact the posted salary range. The actual compensation offered will be based on a variety of job-related factors including relevant skills, education, and experience. This position also includes equity in CoinTracker and benefits like medical, dental, vision, 401(k), life insurance, and PTO.

  • Write high-quality code, value software testing, and uphold best practices in engineering, security, and design

  • Enjoy designing, building, scaling, and maintaining production services

  • Have experience evolving a startup’s architecture to support mid-size company growth

  • 1 - 5 years of software development experience (Multiple levels - junior/mid)

  • Productive, resourceful, and effective at problem-solving

  • Drawn to an early-stage, high-growth startup environment with less stability and more ambiguity

  • Strong fundamentals with a cloud platform like GCP or AWS

  • Interested in financial products and/or cryptocurrency

  • Able to work effectively in a remote setting and able to overlap with our core hours of 9 AM to 12 PM PT

Integrations Core Team

  • Backend engineers on this team build new blockchain and exchange integrations and enrich blockchain data with DeFi categorization as well as exchange data with exchange-specific nuances. While primarily backend-focused, engineers work closely with the Customer Experience team and directly shape the CoinTracker products through the niche expertise they gain in exchange and blockchain data. If you’re excited about digging into the nuances of blockchain and exchange transactions, building reliable integrations at scale, and influencing the product roadmap through your technical and domain expertise, this is the role for you. You’ll also collaborate with the Assets team, which is responsible for crypto metadata and pricing.

Our engineering process includes

  • Code reviews

  • Continuous integration

  • Multiple daily automated deployments to production

  • Automated testing with >85% code coverage

Our tech stack is

  • Web: HTML, Typescript, React, React Native, Styled-Components

  • Mobile: React Native, Expo, GraphQL

  • Backend: Python, Flask, GraphQL, Postgres, BigTable, Redis, Python RQ, Temporal

  • Infrastructure: GCP, Terraform, PostgreSQL, Docker, Pub/Sub, Datadog, PagerDuty

  • You don’t need to know any or all of these, but be willing to learn!

The starting salary for this position is between $121,000 - $175,000 USD. Candidate's location does not impact the posted salary range. The actual compensation offered will be based on a variety of job-related factors including relevant skills, education, and experience. This position also includes equity in CoinTracker and benefits like medical, dental, vision, 401(k), life insurance, and PTO.

jobs.title: Software and Cloud Security Lead
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Overview

CoinTracker makes cryptocurrency portfolio tracking and tax compliance simple. CoinTracker enables consumers and businesses to seamlessly track their cryptocurrency portfolio, investment performance, taxes, and more. We are a globally distributed team on a mission to enable everyone in the world to use crypto with peace of mind. Learn more about our mission, culture, and hiring process.


Some things we’re proud of

  • 🛠️ Building foundational tools in the cryptocurrency space

  • 📄 Over 1M tax forms generated

  • 💲 $250B+ in cryptocurrency is tracked on CoinTracker (~over 5% of the entire crypto market)

  • 🤝 Partnered with Coinbase, H&R Block, Intuit TurboTax, MetaMask, OpenSea, Phantom, Solana, and Uniswap

  • 🗺️ Founders: Jon previously built TextNow (200M downloads), Chandan was previously a product manager at Google & Google[x]

  • 💼 $100M+ venture capital raised from Accel, General Catalyst, Y Combinator, Initialized Capital, Coinbase Ventures, Kraken Ventures, Intuit Ventures, 776 Ventures, Balaji Srinivasan, Claire Hughes Johnson, Gokul Rajaram, Serena Williams, Zach Perret

  • 🌴 Awesome benefits

Your mission

Define and build CoinTracker’s security foundation to meet the needs of our growing B2C, B2B, and B2B2C businesses.

Your one year outcomes

  • Define and implement the security roadmap: Identify short-term wins and establish the long-term foundation to scale CoinTracker’s security posture

  • Embed security into engineering workflows: Lead application security initiatives, including threat modeling, secure code reviews, vulnerability management, and code scanning, and partner with engineering teams to proactively identify and mitigate application risks across our systems and architecture.

  • Build and operationalize security monitoring and response: Establish detection, monitoring, and alerting capabilities, establish ongoing vulnerability management, define and operationalize incident response processes, and lead security postmortems to continuously improve security practices

What you will do

  • Define and execute the security roadmap

  • Lead the design and implementation of secure application and cloud practices, including code scanning, vulnerability management, and infrastructure hardening

  • Define and implement data security and privacy controls, including encryption, secrets management, and regulatory compliance (e.g., SOC 2, GDPR)

  • Establish monitoring, detection, alerting, and logging capabilities. Define and operationalize incident response playbooks, manage vulnerabilities, and lead postmortems to continuously improve processes

  • Partner with engineering and product teams to embed security into the development lifecycle (threat modeling, security reviews, automation)

  • Advocate for security best practices and foster a proactive security mindset across CoinTracker

What we look for

  • Role-agnostic

    • Impact: Demonstrated ability to drive business impact

    • Mission alignment: Hungry and motivated about making progress towards our mission of Enabling everyone in the world to use crypto with peace of mind.

    • Trust: Say what you believe. Do what you say.

    • Communication: Able to clearly talk about the details and also zoom out to the bigger picture

  • Role-specific

    • 8+ years of experience in security engineering or related technical roles, ideally in fast-paced startup or growth-stage environments

    • Security generalist with strong hands-on expertise in application security, complemented by experience in cloud security, IAM, and security operations

    • Hands-on experience with modern cloud environments, Kubernetes, and IaC (Terraform or similar)

    • Familiarity with data protection and privacy frameworks (GDPR, SOC 2, ISO 27001, etc)

    • Experience setting up monitoring, detection, and incident response processes in a high-growth environment

    • Ability to balance pragmatism and rigor: moving fast while ensuring strong security foundations

    • Excellent communication skills to partner across engineering, product, and business teams

    • U.S. citizen and U.S. resident

    • (Bonus) Experience working in fintech or crypto domain

    • (Bonus) Previous experience as the first or early security hire at a startup

The starting salary for this position is between $175,000 - $240,000 USD. Candidate's location does not impact the posted salary range. The actual compensation offered will be based on a variety of job-related factors including relevant skills, education, and experience. This position also includes equity in CoinTracker and benefits like medical, dental, vision, 401(k), life insurance, and PTO.
